comment:
по клику на стену, на которой отметины от попаданий, баркает Паскаль

AmarnathFinalBattleTruth+1 
одноразовый

languages.text: "Фиксирую следы использования волкитного карабина. Фиксирую нарушение протокола — использование воинами Механикус оружия внутри корабельного отсека".
"I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."
languages.original_text: "Фиксирую следы использования волкитного карабина. Фиксирую нарушение протокола — использование воинами Механикус оружия внутри корабельного отсека".

"I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."
"I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."

languages.text: 「ヴォルカイト・カービン銃がここで発砲された証拠を記録している。プロトコル違反だ。船のベイの一角で、帝国技術局の兵士が武器を使用した」
languages.original_text: "I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォルカイト・カービン銃がここで発砲された証拠を記録している。プロトコル違反だ。船のベイの一角で、帝国技術局の兵士が武器を使用した」

languages.text: “检测到明显迹象，曾有人在这里使用热射卡宾枪进行射击。已检测到一项违反协议的行为，机械修会的士兵在船舱内违规使用武器。”
languages.original_text: "I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."

traits.locale_text: “正在登记证据。曾有人在这里使用热射卡宾枪进行射击。已记录到一项违反协议的行为，机械修会的士兵在船舱内违规使用武器。”

languages.text: « Selon mon analyse, une carabine volkite a été utilisée ici. Violation du protocole détectée : utilisation non autorisée d'armes par des soldats de l'Adeptus Mechanicus dans l'une des baies du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."

traits.locale_text: « Je détecte qu'une carabine volkite a été utilisée ici. Violation du protocole détectée : utilisation non autorisée d'armes par des soldats du Mechanicus dans l'une des baies du vaisseau. »

languages.text: «He detectado pruebas de que alguien disparó un rifle de volkita aquí. También se violó un protocolo: el uso de armas por parte de soldados del Adeptus Mechanicus dentro de una de las bahías de la nave».
languages.original_text: "I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."

traits.locale_text: «He detectado pruebas de que alguien disparó un rifle de volkita aquí. También se violó un protocolo: el uso de armas por parte de soldados Mechanicus dentro de una de las bahías de la nave».

languages.text: "Ich registriere Beweise, dass hier ein Volkit-Karabiner abgefeuert wurde. Ich registriere einen Protokollverstoß: Einsatz von Waffen durch Adeptus-Mechanicus-Soldaten innerhalb eines Schiffsmoduls."
languages.original_text: "I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."

traits.locale_text: "Ich registriere Beweise, dass hier ein Volkit-Karabiner abgefeuert wurde. Ich registriere einen Protokollverstoß: Einsatz von Waffen durch Mechanicus-Soldaten innerhalb eines Schiffsmoduls."

languages.text: "Burada bir volkit karabinanın ateşlendiğine dair kanıtı kaydediyorum. Bir protokol ihlalini kayda geçiyorum: Geminin bölmelerinin birinin içinde Adeptus Mechanicus askerleri tarafından silah kullanılmış."
languages.original_text: "I am registering evidence that a volkite carbine was fired here. I am registering a protocol violation: use of weapons by Adeptus Mechanicus soldiers inside one of the ship's bays."

traits.locale_text: "Burada bir volkit karabinanın ateşlendiğine dair kanıt kaydediyorum. Bir protokol ihlali kaydediyorum: Geminin bölmelerinin birinin içinde Adeptus Mechanicus askerleri tarafından silah kullanımı."
